verbs.description: [V: snap] [ARG0: shares] fall after declining user numbers lower revenue guidance snap shares were volatile in post - market trading after the company beat earnings estimates but the daily active users rate fell due to redesign issues it also issued revenue guidance for the first time but it was lower than wall street expected snapchat stories instagram revenue twitter facebook snap european union nbcuniversal
